00042 class HAK : public DAIAlgRG {
00043     private:
00044         std::vector<Factor>                _Qa;
00045         std::vector<Factor>                _Qb;
00046         std::vector<std::vector<Factor> >  _muab;
00047         std::vector<std::vector<Factor> >  _muba;
00049         double _maxdiff;
00051         size_t _iters;
00052 
00053     public:
00055         struct Properties {
00057             DAI_ENUM(ClustersType,MIN,DELTA,LOOP)
00058 
00059             
00060             size_t verbose;
00061 
00063             size_t maxiter;
00064 
00066             double tol;
00067 
00069             double damping;
00070 
00072             ClustersType clusters;
00073 
00075             bool doubleloop;
00076 
00078             size_t loopdepth;
00079         } props;
00080 
00082         static const char *Name;
00083 
00084     public:
00086         HAK() : DAIAlgRG(), _Qa(), _Qb(), _muab(), _muba(), _maxdiff(0.0), _iters(0U), props() {}
00087 
00089         HAK( const HAK &x ) : DAIAlgRG(x), _Qa(x._Qa), _Qb(x._Qb), _muab(x._muab), _muba(x._muba), _maxdiff(x._maxdiff), _iters(x._iters), props(x.props) {}
00090 
00092         HAK& operator=( const HAK &x ) {
00093             if( this != &x ) {
00094                 DAIAlgRG::operator=( x );
00095                 _Qa      = x._Qa;
00096                 _Qb      = x._Qb;
00097                 _muab    = x._muab;
00098                 _muba    = x._muba;
00099                 _maxdiff = x._maxdiff;
00100                 _iters   = x._iters;
00101                 props    = x.props;
00102             }
00103             return *this;
00104         }
00105 
00107         HAK( const FactorGraph &fg, const PropertySet &opts );
00108 
00110         HAK( const RegionGraph &rg, const PropertySet &opts );
00111

00115         virtual HAK* clone() const { return new HAK(*this); }
00116         virtual HAK* create() const { return new HAK(); }
00117         virtual std::string identify() const;
00118         virtual Factor belief( const Var &n ) const;
00119         virtual Factor belief( const VarSet &ns ) const;

00121         virtual Real logZ() const;
00122         virtual void init();

00124         virtual double run();
00125         virtual double maxDiff() const { return _maxdiff; }
00126         virtual size_t Iterations() const { return _iters; }
00128 
00129 
00131 
00132         Factor & muab( size_t alpha, size_t _beta ) { return _muab[alpha][_beta]; }
00133         Factor & muba( size_t alpha, size_t _beta ) { return _muba[alpha][_beta]; }
00134         const Factor& Qa( size_t alpha ) const { return _Qa[alpha]; };
00135         const Factor& Qb( size_t beta ) const { return _Qb[beta]; };

00138         double doDoubleLoop();
